subject: Plus X pedals keep disconnecting
description_text:
Hello i have had the Plux X pedals for a few weeks now and they have 
suddenly stopped working.

First off they would disconnect occasionally and now they dont connect 
at all in Simsonn manager 2.1.0

I have tried other usb ports on my pc and none work.

Thankyou.


-- 
This email has been checked for viruses by Avast antivirus software.
www.avast.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Andy Hardy,  Please try to recover the PlusX pedals: press and hold the recovery button on the controller, then reconnect the USB. SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 should enter recovery mode. Then go to “Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update” and select the pedals-firmware-plusx.sfu file to update. After updating, check the connection. If it still doesn’t work, connect the USB directly to a USB 3.0 port on the back of the PC and avoid using an unpowered USB hub, as unstable power can cause disconnections.

That seems to have worked so far i have offloaded most peripherals to 
powered usb hub, pedals and wheelbase direct connect to mainboard.

Except in lmu throttle is mapped same as turn right in lmu settings X+ 
and X+
Hi Andy Hardy,  We also have an LMU in our testing environment, and game testing shows everything works normally without any issues.
